page.title: 19LUMBER LANE DOG KENNELS
page.content: { Lumber Lane Dog Kennels}is situated down a long drive of the main road out of{Hulland.}The owner has,on average, about{151 dogs}to look after a{year. He takes them on{four walks}a{day}and feeds them on{tinned dog food}and{dog {biscuits.}He started off the business that he has been running for almost {four years}mostly because of his{love of{dogs,}and some{adjacent stables were easily converted into{kennels}at a comparatively{low cost}.All the raw materials come from a local {hypermarket.}The owner enjoys the job, though it does require a{licence.}It is very much a{seasonal job. Summer is very busy,but{Winter}is much quieter, when the owner himself takes a holiday Being situated in the{country}also boosts business.
